title: Darkstar Alliance - LFM + Fridays event: Ultimate Bravery @ 7pm!

embed.description: For Australia and NZ MWO, Star Citizen and other gaming, come visit the Darkstar Alliance

body:
---------------------------------------------------- See the **[ORIGINAL THREAD HERE](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/seYLxP6U-darkstar-alliance)** ----------------------------------------------------


**DarkStar Alliance** is a Aus/NZ casual gaming guild with teamspeak and forums.
_Whilst our league focus is OCE, our player base is world wide_.

We have a mature and relaxed atmosphere. Our members play a broad range of games.
DSA was founded back in 1999 so we're well established and we're here to stay.


>We host both competitive and silly events **[FRIDAY NIGHTS](http://www.darkstar-alliance.com/home)** every week at 7pm, such as 1v1 and 2v2 knockout tournaments, internal 5s, and _Custom Game Modes_ (eg. Ultimate Bravery), and have regular **PRIZES and GIVEAWAYS** for our participating members.
>
>If you're looking for more serious play, we host scheduled _**DSA Ranked 5s Team nights every week**_ as well as impromptu ranked 5s games at any time. The team roster is open to substitutions every fortnight, so if you're keen to be on the team, come along to events and show us what you're made of!



**If you would like to join**
1. visit our website and register via the recruitment tab - http://darkstar-alliance.com/recruitment. 
2. if you haven't already, download teamspeak - https://www.teamspeak.com/downloads. 
3. bookmark DSA in teamspeak, there is a link on the right hand side, mid way down on the DSA home page.
4. get your permissions setup on teamspeak by jumping on and introducing yourself or posting on the forums.

**If you would like to visit before deciding to sign up**
1. just jump on teamspeak, link on DSA home page

Visitors are always welcome to come along and kick some butt. No matter what you're into, casual or hardcore, come check us out!

replies.body:
Fiday night EVENTS NIGHT @7pm Sydney time - This week, Ultimate Bravery mode!
http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/
http://i.imgur.com/ehAp3Wg.jpg

And, welcome to DSA for Pidgeymon, Symbolico, Proff malus, Avollion, T Hamster and Gamer Girls

Join us on teamspeak for mundo excellent times :D


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Oh god, lol. Ultimate Bravery again. Did you see the Fiora build they got on the pro stage - 5 Nashor's tooths. :P
